meanings.definition: The quality of being suitable or capable of being worked on or accomplished.
meanings.sent1: Her workablenesses made her the perfect candidate for the job.
meanings.sent2: The workablenesses of the plan made it easy to implement.
meanings.sent3: His workablenesses in fixing things always amazed his friends.
meanings.sent4: The workablenesses of her ideas shone brightly among the rest.
meanings.sent5: The workablenesses of the puzzle pieces fit together perfectly.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being practical or feasible.
meanings.sent1: The workablenesses of the project made it a success.
meanings.sent2: She always considered the workablenesses of her decisions before acting.
meanings.sent3: The workablenesses of the situation were clear to everyone involved.
meanings.sent4: His workablenesses in problem-solving were unmatched in the team.
meanings.sent5: The workablenesses of the solution were evident from the start.
